Posts.Content: Proud dad --- I'm new to this thread and wanted to say that God is watching over you and your family and you will all get through this. I can't imagine how hard it is having never been through treatment. Your wife is very blessed to have you to take the time to come here and find out information to help her. With love like that, she will be just fine. Having a loving, supportive family will get her through this!!!!
Posts.Title: Possible breast cancer 1 2
